name: Amapiano
description: House from South Africa deriving from previous popular genres including Gqom, Kwaito, and Deep House.

children.name: Afropiano
children.description: Blends the easy-going, poppy, and melodic Afrobeats sound and rhythms with major Amapiano elements, like lush, jazzy, and laid-back atmospheres often featuring light piano chords.
